Class LatestCourseListUI

java.lang.Object
LatestCourseListUI
public class LatestCourseListUI extends Object
The LatestCourseListUI class represents a user interface window that displays a list of courses in a table format. It can optionally show the courses associated with a specific student.

This class uses a SimpleController object to retrieve course and student data, and displays the data in a scrollable JTable within a JFrame.

The window is centered relative to a given parent JFrame and disposes itself on close.

  • Constructor Details

    • LatestCourseListUI

      public LatestCourseListUI(SimpleController controller, JFrame parent)
      Constructs a CourseListUI window displaying all courses. The window is centered relative to the specified parent frame.
      Parameters:
      controller - the controller instance to access data
      parent - the parent JFrame relative to which this window is centered

    • LatestCourseListUI

      public LatestCourseListUI(SimpleController controller, JFrame parent, String studentID)
      Constructs a CourseListUI window displaying courses associated with the specified student, or all courses if the student name is null. The window is centered relative to the specified parent frame.
      Parameters:
      controller - the controller instance to access data
      parent - the parent JFrame relative to which this window is centered
      studentName - the name of the student whose courses to display; if null, all courses are displayed

  • Method Details

    • addNewCourse

      private void addNewCourse(ActionEvent e)
      Prompts the user to enter course details and attempts to add the course using the controller. If any field is left blank, a message is shown and the course is not added.
      Parameters:
      e - the event triggered by the "Add New Course" button

    • registerCourse

      private void registerCourse(ActionEvent e)
      Prompts the user for a course code and registers the student to that course. If the code is invalid or blank, registration is skipped and a message is shown.
      Parameters:
      e - the event triggered by the "Register a Course" button
